nodes.text: Yet if the carriers are not built and properly equipped a shadow will fall over the whole of Britain's defence capability
Second Britain's military standing with America currently so high will suffer unless it can maintain some sort of equivalence with the American military machine now so preponderant.
The British forces it says compensate for technical deficiencies by human achievement.
Finally to touch a matter close to the Prime Minister's heart Britain is at present enjoying an artificial military superiority over its European partners.
The bigger EU states - France Italy Spain and now Germany - are professionalising their armed forces. They are also bracing themselves to accept higher levels of defence spending.
Under the operational point of view UK's military force will plausibly decline
UK's military force plausibly decline under the strategic point of view
UK's military force will probably decline under the point of view of European military politics
It will not only be the Royal Navy that will be threatened with descent into decline
It will be the Army and the Royal Air Force as well.
If the Navy has not the carriers it cannot operate
If a corps cannot operate it will decline
First the Services' ability to mount independent operations will be compromised.
If a corps cannot undertake missions it will descent into decline
The Army will not be able to undertake missions at a distance from the home base because it will not have the air cover essential to its operability.
The Air Force won't be able to operate
It cannot acquire land bases from which to operate outside the home area unless the Navy can provide cover while it does so.
If the Air Force has not bases it cannot operate
It is likely to become less complimentary if Britain falls technically further behind.
If US are not happy with UK military force it is plausible that the latter will lose its standing with them
US are not happy with UK's military organization
If now US are softly complaining about the deficiencies if the deficiencies will increase they will complain in a more severe way
The Pentagon while expressing its appreciation of British combat skills already qualifies its admiration
If the US are disappointed with the military organization they qualify their admiration
